open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Blairgowrie, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre outage | Kwa-Thema, Springs
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Kwa-Thema, Springs, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractors are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our engineers remains our priority.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha
open.description:
We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha, Western Cape.
Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work.
All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
